content: Sometimes, he won’t even bother with the orb, and will simply wave his fan rapidly to create a tornado at your last known position, so staying mobile and pressing your attack can help you avoid these attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guangmou.md', within the main section titled 'Guangmou', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Guangmou' and the sub-subsection 'Guangmou Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Sometimes, he won’t even bother with the orb, and will simply wave his fan rapidly to create a tornado at your last known position, so staying mobile and pressing your attack can help you avoid these attacks.
